pullRequest.title: Issue 8538
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before we only allowed CMS Admin to create top-level categories, now if a user has the required permissions (Add Children and Edit at All Sites) is able to add top-level categories.
Also a small refactor to the CategoryAPI was made, unused methods were deleted, even permissions level and logs.

commit.message: #8538 allow limited user add top level categories
